EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-06-20-Cisco-UCS-Demo.2018-06-15-Cisco-UCS-Demo Invite 1b (Cisco Live Vi
EmailTemplate.subject: Will you join us next Wednesday?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-ucs-demo/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
It was great seeing you this week at Cisco Live!
As a follow-up to our introduction, we'd like to invite you to join us for a live webinar featuring Turbonomic automated control and optimization of a Cisco UCS environment. With the powerful combination of Turbonomic and Cisco UCS, we further extend the full stack capabilities of workload automation in your data center.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-ucs-demo/]]>
In this 30-minute live demo, Director of Technical Marketing and Technology Evangelist, Eric Wright will showcase the complete understanding and control – extending from the physical to the virtual layers of the stack – that Turbonomic brings to a Cisco UCS environment.
We hope to see you there! Regards, Team Turbonomic
